name: The Weather Snowy Canvas
text:
You can only control 1 "Snowy Weathery Pattern". "Weathery" Effect Monsters in your Main Monster Zone in the same column as this card, and Main Monster Zones adjacent to that zone, gain this effect.
â—? (Quick Effect): You can banish this card; add 1 "Weathery" card from your Deck to your hand, also you cannot add cards from the Deck to your hand except by drawing them for the rest of this turn.
